title: Create step-context and step-tone components
description:
## Objective

Create the two new discovery step components: step-context (step 5, LLM question + fragments) and step-tone (step 6, LLM question + single-word chips).

## Spec Reference

**Spec:** docs/projects/2026-02-11-fo-11/2026-02-11-fo-11-spec.md — Sections: "Step 5: Context", "Step 6: Tone"

## Scope

**Files to create:**
- app/fo-11/components/step-context.tsx
- app/fo-11/components/step-tone.tsx

## Implementation

1. step-context.tsx:
   - Props: currentStep, name, question (LLM-generated string), initialChips, expandedChips, value, onChange, onContinue, isLoading
   - Renders only when currentStep matches
   - Uses FragmentInput with mode="fragments" (hybrid fragments ending with "...")
   - The question comes from props (LLM-generated), not from a constants file
   - Reference app/fo-10/components/step-why.tsx for the pattern

2. step-tone.tsx:
   - Props: same as step-context
   - Uses FragmentInput with mode="words" (single-word chips)
   - Add helper text below the question: "For example: calm, motivational, gentle, clear..."
   - The question comes from props (LLM-generated)
   - Reference app/fo-10/components/step-support.tsx for the pattern, but with mode="words" instead of mode="sentences"

## Tests

1. TypeCheck — both components compile

Run: npx tsc --noEmit

Do NOT close until tests pass.
